title: Initial Launch pressing X button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user has a game selected (one should be selected by default) and presses the controller's X button
custom_expected: THEN the selected game WILL NOT begin playing

title: Initial Launch pressing Circle button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user has a game selected (one should be selected by default) and presses the controller's Circle button
custom_expected: THEN the selected game WILL begin playing

title: Pressing X button  (Log In Later)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Login Required window is open
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Log In Later)
custom_expected:
THEN the Login Required window will close
AND the user will be returned to the previous screen

title: Pressing Circle button (Log In Now)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Login Required window is open
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button (for Log In Now)
custom_expected:
THEN the Login Required window will close
AND the user will have the Login to MLB.TV window open so that they may enter their credentials

title: Pressing X button (Back)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Login to MLB.TV window is open
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Back)
custom_expected:
THEN the Login to MLB.TV window will close
AND the user will be returned to the previous screen

title: Pressing Circle button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Login to MLB.TV window is open
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button while having the Email field or password field selected
custom_expected:
THEN the alphanumeric virtual keyboard will appear
AND the user may enter their credentials

title: Pressing X button (Close)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND user opens the Menu window
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Close)
custom_expected:
THEN the Main Menu window will close
AND the user will be returned to the previous screen

title: Pressing Circle button
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Main Menu window is open
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button while having each item selected

(repeat for each selectable item (EXCEPT Today---this is covered by another case): Home Team, Calendar, Stats & Standings, Settings)
custom_expected: THEN the appropriate sub-menu will appear

title: Today
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND the Game Select screen isn't on Today's date (either on a prior date or future date)
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button
custom_expected: THEN the Game Select screen will return to the current date

title: Home Team pressing X (Back)
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Home Team's 'Select Team to Display' window is open
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the controller's X button (for Back)
custom_expected:
THEN Team Select screen will close
AND user will be returned to the previous screen

title: Home Team pressing Circle
custom_preconds:
MLB app has been downloaded to PS3/4
AND launched from the XMB/Home menu
AND user IS NOT logged in
AND Home Team's 'Select Team to Display' window is open
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the controller's Circle button while having each item selected

(repeat for each team)
custom_expected:
THEN the appropriate team will become the Home Team
AND the Team Select screen will close
AND user will be returned to the previous screen
